info.name: Mirador Core API
info.description: Postman collection for testing MIRADOR-CORE endpoints, including Lucene-compatible and Bleve search queries (translated server-side).

Basic time-window correlation: Find error logs that occurred within 5 minutes of CPU usage spikes above 80%
Label-based correlation: Find correlations between logs and metrics for the same service (checkout)
Multi-engine correlation: Find exceptions within 10 minutes of error traces and high error rates
Performance correlation: Find slow requests (response time > 5s) that correlate with high CPU usage
Database correlation: Find connection timeouts that occur when database connection pool is exhausted
Memory correlation: Find OutOfMemoryError logs that correlate with high memory usage
Get health status of all unified query engines (metrics, logs, traces, correlation)
Get metadata about supported query capabilities and engines
